i1.name: Break the Mold
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rell's''' [[basic attack]]s steal 10% of the target's {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds and deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} equal to {{as|{{pp|8 to 16}}|magic damage}} plus the '''total''' amount of {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} stolen.
Enemies can only be stolen from once but multiple enemies can be stolen from at a time. Subsequent attacks against a target that is already stolen from will only refresh the duration of the effect and attacking an enemy champion refreshes the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
''Break the Mold'' steals a minimum of {{pp|5 to 12 for 8|1;3;5;8;10;12;15;17}} {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}}, reduced to {{pp|0 to 2 for 3|1;2;13}} against {{tip|minions}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Rell's basic attacks steal 10% of the target's armor and magic resistance for 4 seconds and deal bonus magic damage equal to 8undefined − 16undefined (based on level) plus the total amount of armor and magic resistance stolen.
Enemies can only be stolen from once but multiple enemies can be stolen from at a time. Subsequent attacks against a target that is already stolen from will only refresh the duration of the effect and attacking an enemy champion refreshes the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
Break the Mold steals a minimum of 1;3;5;8;10;12;15;17 ‒ undefined armor and magic resistance, reduced to 1;2;13 ‒ undefined against minions.
Rell's attack windup is reduced
i1.notes: * The stolen resistances are applied after the damage has been dealt.

q1.name: Shattering Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' thrusts her lance in the target direction, destroying damage-mitigating {{tip|shield|shields}} of enemies hit before dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with {{ai|Break the Mold|Rell}}.
If '''Rell''' is tethered with {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}}, she and the bound ally {{tip|heal}} for each enemy champion hit.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction, destroying damage-mitigating shields of enemies hit before dealing them magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with Break the Mold.
If Rell is tethered with Attract and Repel, she and the bound ally heal for each enemy champion hit.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|70*0.5 to 210*0.5}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal Per Champion|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of '''missing''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Shattering Strike'' will cast from wherever '''Rell''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Rell''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of moving, attacking, and casting any other ability except {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}} for {{fd|0.35}} seconds after ''Shattering Strike'' is cast.
** Casting {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}} will cancel ''Shattering Strike''. The ability will not go on cooldown but will still expend {{as|mana}}.{{bug|2}}
* ''Shattering Strike'', while binded to an ally, will grant the {{tip|heal}} from hitting {{tip|clone|clones}} as well.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Secondary Damage: (+ 25% AP)
• Heal Per Champion: (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% of missing health)

e1.name: Attract and Repel
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rell''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between her and the ally bound by ''Attract and Repel'', which is disabled while the remaining cooldown is greater than {{fd|2.5}} seconds. While the tether persists, the ally gains {{as|10% of her '''total''' armor}} and {{as|10% of her '''total''' magic resistance}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' magnetically binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with ''Attract and Repel''. '''Rell''' can then recast ''Attract and Repel'' while the tether persists.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Rell''' erupts the tether, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to and {{tip|stun|stunning}} all enemies between and around her and the bound ally for 1 second.

'''Rell''' can [[Unit-targeted|self-target]] to dispel the current bind if she has not casted an [[champion ability|ability]] nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
''Attract and Repel'' will incur a {{fd|2.5}}-second {{sti|cooldown}} with no cost if '''Rell''' binds to an ally or self-targets.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, which is disabled while the remaining cooldown is greater than 2.5 seconds. While the tether persists, the ally gains 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance.
Active: Rell magnetically binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.
Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage to and stunning all enemies between and around her and the bound ally for 1 second.
Rell can Unit-targeted to dispel the current bind if she has not casted an champion ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
Attract and Repel will incur a 2.5-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally or self-targets.
e1.notes:
* The effects render before the cast time.
* All units can see the effective area of the tether.
* ''Attract and Repel'' will be placed on a very short cooldown (less than {{fd|0.1}} seconds) when the tether is reapplied to the bound ally after the two become in tether range again.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{ap|18 to 11}}' as '18/16.25/14.5/12.75/11' and riot's value '18,15.5,14,12.5,11' as '18/15.5/14/12.5/11'

r1.name: Magnet Storm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' erupts with magnetic fury, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} all nearby enemies towards her and creating a field of gravitational force around her for the next 2 seconds that deals {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the duration and continuously {{tip|kinematics|drags}} them towards her.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury, pulling all nearby enemies towards her and creating a field of gravitational force around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds over the duration and continuously drags them towards her.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ {{fd|8.75}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage Per Target|{{ap|120 to 280}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Magnet Storm'' will cast from wherever '''Rell''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Enemies that leave the field can still be dragged after entering the corresponding area again.
* ''Magnet Storm'' will '''not''' drag units that are:
** {{tip|Dash|Dashing}}.
** Being displaced (e.g. by {{tip|airborne}} effects or via abilities such as {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}).
** {{tip|Attach|Attached}}.
** {{tip|Displacement immune|Displacement immune}}.
** {{tip|cc-immune|Immune to crowd control}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the initial {{tip|airborne|pull}} but not the dragging effect.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 8.75% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage Per Target: (+ 70% AP)
